articles.title: What Goes in Does Come Out—So Here’s What You Need To Know About Eating Before Anal Sex - Well+Good
articles.description: An anal sex educator and nutritionist who works primarily with the LGBTQ+ population dish on the best pre-anal eating tips for keeping poop out of the picture.
